column7: Study at the graduate level in viola; selected studies from the masterworks in viola literature. Graduate standing in music, or successful completion of a qualifying audition for the String faculty. 2 to 5 graduate hours. No professional credit. May be repeated to a maximum of 20 hours. Prerequisite: Graduate standing in music, or successful completion of a qualifying audition for the String faculty; concurrent registration in Symphony Orchestra for students in the Master of Music curriculum in strings.
